Moira Butts

Network Engineer I · Chesapeake, VA · (757) 337-9159 · buttsmoira@gmail.com

About

Moira Butts is an emerging talent in the field of information technology, currently serving as a Level 1 Network Engineer. In her role, she collaborates with district-level staff to provide essential technical support, ensuring seamless operations for administration. With a strong focus on network security, Moira has earned the CompTIA Cybersecurity Certification through Virginia Wesleyan University. Driven by a passion for advancing her career, she is actively pursuing additional certifications to deepen her expertise and further her research in the ever-evolving field of IT. Moira's commitment to professional growth and her dedication to securing critical network infrastructures make her a promising and dynamic presence in the technology space.

Experienced and customer-focused IT professional, Moira is seeking to bring in a strong background in technical support, systems installation, and troubleshooting of complex hardware and software issues across diverse platforms.

Speaker - Mentorship vs. Sponsorshiop Event Black Brand

Insights on career development, sharing personal and professional experiences to distinguish the roles of mentorship and sponsorship in professional growth.

Attendee - CI/CD for Static Sites with GitHub Actions

Attended a comprehensive workshop on continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) practices, focusing on GitHub Actions implementation and workflow automation."

Interests

Although technology has played a significant role in my life, I have also found fulfillment in other activities outside of my career. For instance, art has become a huge passion of mine, so I love creating new projects. I enjoy drawing portraits, painting canvases and photography. I have entered a few competitions along the way. When I am not creating, you’ll find me reading a book or writing in my journal. I am obsessed with beauty and style, so I always keep myself updated on the latest makeup and hair trends.

Spending quality time with family and friends is important so I always make sure to be around those I love. I adopted an insanely handsome orange cat named Chestnut who brings endless joy to my days! I am filled with so much gratitude and can’t wait for what the universe has in store for me.
